title: John Oliver | DeSantis' Cruel Martha's Vineyard Stunt Backfires; Trump Humiliates J.D. Vance: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Republicans turning to their favorite election year scare tactic of lying about immigration, highlighted by Florida Governor Ron DeSantis' sadistic stunt of luring undocumented migrants onto a plane to Martha's Vineyard.

Then, John Oliver talks about his Emmy win for Last Week Tonight being presented by Selena Gomez, Steve Martin and Martin Short; shares his reaction to the 10 days of mourning for Queen Elizabeth; and discusses turning down his offer for the Order of the British Empire. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
